overview: Stunning new 18 year old Raivo Lexus has been recruited to become a new exclusive model for Triumvirate Productions. Raivo travels from his small town to Riga for some training by Ray Renfro. After some hot sex with the train conductor, Ludvig Lyons, Raivo joins Ray and gets right to work. Ray feels rejected when Raivo is invited to a bareback sex party, but is brought back to life when a chance encounter with a handsome waiter, Danny DeNiro, revitalizes his sex drive. Thirteen hot Latvian and Russian models with plenty of condom-free fucking and post-orgasm sperm gobbling.
title: Postcards from Riga
